subject: SEDEX Certified Garment Supplier Introduction
body: I hope this message finds you well.
I'm reaching out to introduce Micro Knit Apparels, a Tirupur, India-based knitted apparel manufacturing company with a strong focus on sustainability and quality. We specialize in:
Our products include tops, shirts, bottoms and Pyjamas.

We have worked for leading global brands—currently through agents such as LPP (Poland) and Guess SAGL (USA), and previously through direct partnerships with C-Life (USA) and Karel Piu (Gallone SPA, Italy).
• Monthly production capacity: 150,000 pieces and 50,000 value-added products
• Quicker production timelines (Samples minimum 72 hours and production minimum 30 days - 40% to 50% faster than average suppliers in India)
I've attached our company profile and recent collection for your reference. If our capabilities align with your sourcing needs, I'd be glad to connect further.
R. Muthusamy & Bros, Industrial Complex, Palladam Road,
